document.forum_title: Latest Europe News on One News Page
document.topic_text: 3 hours ago ) David Cameron has followed through with his pledge to resign and has been succeeded by Theresa May at 10 Downing Street. Follow EurActiv's live coverage as the new UK government begins to deal with the country's exit from the EU.
document.post: 3 hours ago ) David Cameron has followed through with his pledge to resign and has been succeeded by Theresa May at 10 Downing Street. Follow EurActiv's live coverage as the new UK government begins to deal with the country's exit from the EU.
